title: The Hunted
description: In Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, a woman is trying to hide from her past. Terry Jones takes pride in being an invisible office drone, boring and practical. Then the man with the red and black tattoo shows up.Terry can run again, and hope she’s fast enough, or she can fight for her freedom. All she has to do is keep her temper in check. The Hunted is a tense look at people under pressure and the lengths they’ll go to stay safe.
author: Kate   Whitaker
